Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $199 by us, reflecting its high-quality craftsmanship and unique features. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at an introductory price of $189. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the unparalleled quality and functionality of our product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $189. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $189
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
